item.title: docker minio
item.description: docker run -itd -p 9000:9000 -p 9001:9001 --name minio --restart=always -e "MINIO_ROOT_USER=zouni88" -e "MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=qaz521.." -v /mnt/data:/usr/local/minio/data -v /mnt/config:/usr/local/minio/config minio/minio server --console-address ":9001" --address ":9000" /data docker run -p 9000:9000 -p 9001:9001 minio/minio server /data --console-address ":9001"
